title: Servers Are Broken
body: Constant packet drops happening on your end Riot. Traced them, they were dropped at your servers.

replies.body: Having the same issue. Was forced out of a ranked during ban. Hmmm.....{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
The servers are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them.
The is also an issue with reloging on to the NA servers. And if your on the sever currently you can still make create and shop in store.
This is also affecting logins. It's affecting everything actually.
How long will it take to fix it? do you think it's gonna be a major issue on league or is it manageable???

It's a large-scale issue as it's affecting everything, login, chat, in-game lag and disconnects, client and champ select disconnects, store disconnects, Hextech disconnects etc. 

Rest assured Riot is actively working to resolve these issues as quickly as possible.

There were some issues going on with the service platform on NA last night. After some investigation, our network engineers were able to resolve it.

If you're still experiencing issues with your connection to the servers, please let me know.
I still cant log in to NA servers. Can you help me? Im getting the 'connection to pvp.net' error when I try.
I literally cannot log in at all since being disconnected.
my game went back to how it used to look like... old set ups, old match history, old hero charts.....

Could be a result of the server instability. I'd advise you to wait until the instability is resolved. 

If after it's resolved your still experience this;

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
